settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Campaign Overview
settings.row_content: We value every voice from our customers. Join our User Generated Content (UGC) Cashback Campaign and receive 50% cashback on your wig order by submitting authentic photos or videos of your wig-wearing experience!

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Eligibility
settings.row_content:
Open to customers who have purchased any wig product directly from ailsas.com.

Accessories (such as wig caps or styling tools) are excluded from this campaign.

Valid only for customers residing in the UK.

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign:  How to Participate
settings.row_content:
Step 1 ‚Äì Place an order for any wig on our website.

Step 2 ‚Äì After receiving the wig, submit one of the following:

Clear, front-facing photo(s) wearing the wig (minimum three image)

Short video showing unboxing, trying-on, or styling experience

Step 3 ‚Äì Submit Your Content
To qualify for the 50% cashback reward, you must submit authentic user-generated content based on one of the following two options:

Option A ‚Äì Public Review Submission
Leave a review with photos or a video on the product page of the item you purchased from ailsas.com.

After posting, send an email to hello@ailsas.com including:

Your Order Number

A link or screenshot of your public review

Option B ‚Äì Direct Content Submission
If you prefer to submit directly, email us:

At least 3 clear photos showcasing the wig being worn
or

A short video (e.g., unboxing, try-on, or first impressions)

Send to: hello@ailsas.com with your Order Number

üîî Important: By submitting your content, you agree that Ailsas has the right to use it across its marketing channels, including but not limited to website galleries, social media, and promotional materials.

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign:  Cashback Details
settings.row_content:
‚úîÔ∏è Get 50% of your order value back once your content is approved.

‚úîÔ∏è Cashback will be returned via the original payment method.

‚úîÔ∏è Processing time: 3 working days

‚úîÔ∏è One cashback per order only

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Participation Limit
settings.row_content:
The offer is available for the first 100 qualified participants only ‚Äì on a first-come, first-served basis.

No official end date, but spots are limited. Act fast!

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Content Rights
settings.row_content:
By submitting your content, you agree to grant Ailsas the rights to use your photos or videos for:

Website display

Social media and advertising campaigns

Email promotions and related marketing activities

Ailsas may edit or crop submissions for visual clarity without altering the intent or authenticity. All content will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Disclaimer & Final Rights
settings.row_content:
Ailsas reserves the right to make final decisions regarding cashback eligibility.

Fraudulent, unclear, or duplicate content will not qualify.

These terms may be subject to change without prior notice.
